content: Vincenzo IovinoSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationVincenzo IovinoI have been CTO at Virtual Labs and previously researcher and co-founder at Aragon ZK Researcher and previously assistant professor at University of Salerno and research associates at the Universities of Luxembourg and Warsaw.My main research interests include cryptography, cybersecurity and e-voting.Publications and works.A list of my publications can be obtained from my DBLP's or Google Scholar's page.
